sentences.english: Police stations and offices of the ruling National Democratic Party were on fire across the country.
sentences.chinese: 全国各地的警局和执政党党部被焚烧。

sentences.english: The improvement of the work style of the party in power means its life and death.
sentences.chinese: ⑴执政党的党风建设关系到它的生死存亡。

sentences.english: The ruling party is sure to start bickering if it loses next weekend.
sentences.chinese: 如果在下周末败北，执政党内肯定将开始争吵。

sentences.english: South Korea's ruling Saenuri party has taken the majority of seats in parliamentary polls.
sentences.chinese: 韩国执政党新进党赢得议会选举的多数席位。

sentences.english: Politics incorruptibility construction directly affects the common people's trust towards the execution party.
sentences.chinese: 廉政建设直接影响老百姓对执政党的信任程度。

sentences.english: Others in the ruling party accused Sarkozy of betraying his Gaullist heritage.
sentences.chinese: 执政党中还有其他人也指责萨科奇背叛了戴高乐主义。

sentences.english: As the ruling party, our party has always been the most important anti-corruption work.
sentences.chinese: 作为执政党，我们党反腐工作一直都是重中之重。

sentences.english: Three parties lined up to deal with the government party.
sentences.chinese: 三个党派联合起来对付执政党。

sentences.english: Mr. Fernandez is a top official of the governing PAN Party.
sentences.chinese: 费南德兹是执政党国家行动党高级官员。

sentences.english: The theory of the construction of the ruling party, a constantly progressive and innovative science, has been developing tortuously since the October Revolution.
sentences.chinese: 执政党建设理论是不断发展和创新的常青的科学。

sentences.english: Do not think for a minute that power concedes.
sentences.chinese: 一时一刻都不要以为执政党认输了。

sentences.english: Hamas defeated the ruling Fateh party.
sentences.chinese: 哈马斯击败了执政党法塔赫。

sentences.english: First, working class party in power must coordinate relationship with masses.
sentences.chinese: 第一，工人阶级执政党必须处理好与人民群众的关系。

sentences.english: Rodong Shinmun is Korean for “Labor Newspaper” and is the official organ of the ruling Workers’ Party in the North.
sentences.chinese: 《劳动新闻》是朝鲜执政党劳动党的官方喉舌。

sentences.english: They appeal to the governing party, the African National Congress, to abandon the planned measures.
sentences.chinese: 他们要求执政党南非国民大会党放弃这些计划的措施。

sentences.english: Party's deportment and honest government construction are great issue that the party construction faces to.
sentences.chinese: 党风廉政建设是执政党建设面临的重大课题。

definition: within the party (esp. Chinese communist party)
African National Congress, ANC/abbr. for 非洲人國民大會|非洲人国民大会[Fei1 zhou1 ren2 guo2 min2 da4 hui4]
